about_the_game:
Acrogorpon is a retro-styled 3D multiplayer FPS game, offering a unique blend of acrobatics, intense gore, and a diverse arsenal of weapons.

Current Features:

  • 16 Damage and Limb Separation Zones: Experience unparalleled realism with advanced damage modeling and precise limb separation mechanics.

  • Customizable Text: Personalize your in-game interface with fully customizable text options.

  • Bindable Configuration System: Enjoy flexible control schemes with a comprehensive bindable configuration system.

  • Extensive Voting Options: Engage the community with a wide array of in-game voting options for enhanced player involvement.

  • In-game Admin Commands: Utilize powerful admin commands for seamless game management and moderation.

  • Game Customization: Tailor your gaming experience with extensive customization options to match your style.

  • Widescreen and Non-Widescreen Support (16:9, 4:3): Experience the game in both widescreen and standard screen formats for versatile display support.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features a high degree of blood and gore, including character limb separations. Some users may find the content sensitive.

short_description: Battle your way to the top in this retro 3D FPS game. Inspired by classic shooters from the late '90s and early 2000s, offering a rich nostalgic experience for both veteran gamers and newcomers alike.
